com.wrapper.spotify

Interface HttpManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpotifyHttpManager

    public interface HttpManager
    A simple HTTP connection interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String delete(UtilProtos.Url url)
      Perform an HTTP DELETE request to the specified URL.
      String get(UtilProtos.Url url)
      Perform an HTTP GET request to the specified URL.
      String post(UtilProtos.Url url)
      Perform an HTTP POST request to the specified URL.
      String put(UtilProtos.Url url)
      Perform an HTTP PUT request to the specified URL.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        String get(UtilProtos.Url url)
           throws WebApiException,
                  IOException
        Perform an HTTP GET request to the specified URL.
        Parameters:
        url - the UtilProtos.Url to HTTP GET.
        Returns:
        a String containing the body of the HTTP GET response.
        Throws:
        WebApiException - In case of error replies from the Web API.
        IOException - In case of networking issues.
